about_the_game:
Deactivate the dark gems and defeat the witch Oculla to avoid a demonic invasion!

The witch Oculla has made a pact with the demons that will provoke a new demonic invasion on Earth. She managed to find and reactivate the Dark Gems that will permit the reopening of prohibited diabolic portal that was sealed in the past. She is on the ruins of the unholy zone and is going to use her power to get it.
This evil plan has been discovered by the Brotherhood of Light. The gems of light automatically return to be activated when the dark gems are reactivated.
So dictates destiny!


GAME

The game consists of two phases:

- In the first phase you must absorb the energy balls of the same color using corresponding gems of light. The gems of light will acumullate energy that you can shoot at the the dark gems to weaken them.
(ONLY IN THE FULL GAME) Game will autosave when you weaken a dark gem by 50% and by 100%. More concrete details in the section "How to play" when you start a game.


(ONLY IN THE FULL GAME)
- In the second phase, after you deactivated the dark gems, you will fight against Oculla in a turn-based combat where you will have a serie of actions that you must choose in convenience.

The election of the initial character and your ability in the first phase can be determinant in the final combat.


FEATURES:
- Two game styles in one. (ONLY IN THE FULL GAME. DEMO = 1 limited phase)
- Autosave (save points) and load games. (ONLY IN THE FULL GAME)
- Steam cloud.
- Steam overlay.
- List of scores (local). (ONLY IN THE FULL GAME)
- Achievements (Steam and local). (ONLY IN THE FULL GAME)


NOTES:
- The game requires the "Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2022 redistributable x64" package for the correct functioning of the Steam features linked to the game. It will give an error when running the game if this package is not installed. Steam will install this package the first time you run the game.
- The game is designed to be used with mouse or touch. For the first stage of the game it is also possible to use some keyboard keys.

short_description: Bewitched Balls is partly a color matching arcade puzzle game and partly a turn-based combat game set in a world of magic and fantasy where your goal is to defuse six evil gems and finally fight against a powerful witch.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian
